# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README add20.cir add20.cir.tags add32.cir add32.cir.tags chip2.cir chip2.cir.tags dac.cir dac.cir.tags fadd32.cir fadd32.cir.tags mem_plus.cir mem_plus.cir.tags pc_frame.cir pc_frame.cir.tags pchip.cir pchip.cir.tags ram2k.cir ram2k.cir.tags smult20.cir smult20.cir.tags sqrt.cir sqrt.cir.tags sram.cir sram.cir.tags voter.cir voter.cir.tags voter25.cir voter25.cir.tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> mem_plus.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir PROPERTY LABELS "circuitsim90;serial;parallel;weekly;mos2;performance")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP mem_plus.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} mem_plus.cir ${OutputDataDir}/CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir.prn mem_plus.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED mem_plus.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "circuitsim90;serial;parallel;weekly;mos2;performance")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> mem_plus.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir PROPERTY LABELS "circuitsim90;serial;parallel;weekly;mos2;performance")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP mem_plus.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} mem_plus.cir ${OutputDataDir}/CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir.prn mem_plus.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED mem_plus.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}CircuitSim90/MOS2_LARGE/mem_plus.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "circuitsim90;serial;parallel;weekly;mos2;performance")
endif()
